Package jbb.engine.pacman

Class Summary
Cam  
Danny  
Ghost The Ghost currently moves towards the position using the NPCs movement method.
PacDot The PacDot provides points for PacMan, and if it is additionally a PowerPellet, it grants PacMan invulnerability for 10 turns.
PacGame The PacGame instantiates a PacWorld, receives a position from the user, and procedes to call playTurn with the obtained position.
PacGameView  
PacMan PacMan is the Hero of PacGame.
PacWorld  
Sam
